MEHAT Schedule — Fall Term 2024

Oct 1, 2024

We are excited to announce the Fall 2024 schedule for the Middle East History and Theory Workshop at The University of Chicago. The workshop will meet in person on Thursdays from 4:00–5:30 PM in Pick Hall 218, unless otherwise noted.

In cases where the speaker has opted to pre-circulate a paper, it will be distributed via our listhost.
